metadata.Title: ALSA-2023:0208: java-1.8.0-openjdk security and bug fix update (Moderate)
metadata.Description:
The java-1.8.0-openjdk packages provide the OpenJDK 8 Java Runtime Environment and the OpenJDK 8 Java Software Development Kit.

Security Fix(es):

* OpenJDK: improper restrictions in CORBA deserialization (Serialization, 8285021) (CVE-2023-21830)
* OpenJDK: soundbank URL remote loading (Sound, 8293742) (CVE-2023-21843)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Bug Fix(es):

* Leak File Descriptors Because of ResolverLocalFilesystem#engineResolveURI() (BZ#2139705)
* Prepare for the next quarterly OpenJDK upstream release (2023-01, 8u362) [almalinux-8] (BZ#2159910)
* solr broken due to access denied ("java.io.FilePermission" "/etc/pki/java/cacerts" "read") [almalinux-8, openjdk-8] (BZ#2163595)
